name: String Theory (BarJam 2021)
description:
NOTE: web build does not switch scenes, so only the tutorial is playable. The windows download is below!

String Theory is a game where you place ropes and hit targets to place more ropes to hit more targets to place more ropes to hit more targets ropes targets ropes targets ropes targets...

Man, writing descriptions is easy!

CONTROLS

___________

LMB to swing your hammer

RMB to place a new rope

SPACE to drop down from your current rope

CREATED BY

_____________

Jirushi and Nitricswight
